Hi, I'm Sarkash Talib

I'm a Front / Back End Developer based in outskirts of London.

I am a highly motivated, ambitious and hard-working person. I love combining the worlds of logic and creative design to make eye-catching, accessible, and user-friendly websites and applications.

I am constantly looking for new opportunities to further expand my skills and knowledge. I am a fast learner and pride myself on my attention to details.
